article_title: Donald Trump takes aim again as thousands pack Worcester rally
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox

article_metadata.description:
WORCESTER - Riding high in the polls and brimming with confidence, Republican presidential hopeful Donald J. Trump enjoyed more than an hour in the thrall of thousands of supporters at the DCU Center Wednesday night.
Nothing seemed out of bounds for Mr. Trump as he skipped from topic to topic, from political finance to the economy to Obamacare, Syria, Paris, and immigration. And he didn't hold back at three separate points in the rally when protesters were escorted out.
At one point near the
article_metadata.author: Steven H. Foskett Jr. Telegram & Gazette Staff
